id.description: The unique identifier for the chat

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user who sent the chat message

id.description: The unique identifier for the chat message

text.description: The text content of the chat message

role.description: The role of the sender of the chat message, e.g., 'user' or 'assistant'

parentMessageId.description: The unique identifier for the parent chat message, if applicable

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the chat message was created
